Name: payment-accounting-editor
Label: Payment Accouting Editor

Components.Label: Print Invoice
Components.Query:
select MasterData.Name as CustomerType,de.Name as Department,Partner.Address AS addresscus,sales.PhoneNumber AS telsales,sales.Email AS email,sales.NickName AS nickname,de.Name as Department,ct.JobTitles AS JobTitles ,ct.ContactName AS ContactName ,ct.ContactPhoneNumber AS telcus, (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONCAT(cont.Name, ' x ', Round(InquiryContainer.Quantity,0)), ' & ') as ContainerText
FROM InquiryContainer
LEFT JOIN MasterData cont ON InquiryContainer.ContainerTypeId = cont.Id
WHERE InquiryId = '{Id}') as ContainerText
from Inquiry
left join Partner on Inquiry.CustomerId = Partner.Id
left join MasterData on Partner.CustomerTypeId = MasterData.Id
LEFT JOIN PartnerContact ct ON ct.PartnerId = Partner.Id
LEFT JOIN [USER] sales on dbo.Partner.SaleId = sales.Id 
left join [User] u on u.Id = '{TokenUserId}'
left join MasterData de on de.Id = u.DepartmentId
where Inquiry.Id = '{Id}'

select concat(pol.Name,pod.Name) as Level1,detail.GroupFee, pol.Name as Pol,pod.Name as Pod,fee.Name as Description,otherUnit.Name as Unit,curr.Code as Curr,
(select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%LCL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId)+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0) as LCL,
Round((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%20%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId)+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0),{CTotalPrice}) as Cont20,
(select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%40%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId)
+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0)+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0) as Cont40,
(select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%45%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId)
+ 
isnull((select sum(isnull(Rate,0))
from InquiryDetail detail2
left join MasterData unit on detail2.UnitId = unit.Id
where InquiryId = '{Id}' 
and unit.Name like N'%ALL%'
and detail2.PolId = detail.PolId 
and detail2.PodId = detail.PodId
and detail2.DescriptionId = detail.DescriptionId),0) as Cont45
from InquiryDetail detail
left join Terminal pol on detail.PolId = pol.Id
left join Terminal pod on detail.PodId = pod.Id
left join MasterData curr on detail.CurrencyId = curr.Id
left join FeeType fee on detail.DescriptionId = fee.Id
left join MasterData unit on detail.UnitId = unit.Id
left join MasterData groupFee on fee.GroupId = groupFee.Id
left join MasterData otherUnit on detail.OtherUnitId = otherUnit.Id
where OtherFee = 1 and InquiryId = '{Id}'
group by pol.Name,detail.PolId,pod.Name,detail.PodId,detail.CurrencyId,curr.Code,detail.DescriptionId,fee.Name,otherUnit.Name,detail.GroupFee,groupFee.Enum
ORDER BY concat(pol.Name,pod.Name),groupFee.Enum ASC

Components.Label: Print Draft
Components.Query: SELECT cus.CompanyName AS Partnerv, ISNULL(cus.Address,'') AS addv, ISNULL(cus.PhoneNumber,'') AS Tel, ISNULL(cus.Fax,'') AS Fax, ISNULL(sminv.Code,'DRAFT') AS Invno, ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.InvoiceDate,'dd MMM, yyyy'),'') AS Dateinv, sm.MblNo AS MBLNo, pol.Name AS POLName, POD.Name AS PODName, ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtdDate,'dd MMM, yyyy'),'') AS ETD, ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtaDate,'dd MMM, yyyy'),'') AS ETA, ISNULL(sm.Quantity,'') AS Volume, dt.Quantity, (ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(sm.VesselVoy,'')) AS vessal , CASE WHEN sminv.RevisedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 'Revised Date: ' + ISNULL(FORMAT(sminv.RevisedDate,'dd MMM, yyy'),'') ELSE '' end AS Reviseddate, CASE WHEN sminv.VoucherTypeId = 1 AND sminv.DebitAmount<0 THEN 'CREDIT NOTE' WHEN sminv.VoucherTypeId = 1 AND sminv.DebitAmount>=0 THEN 'DEBIT NOTE' ELSE 'INVOICE' END AS Titles, CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN 'Original Curr' ELSE curr.Name END AS Currinv, FORMAT(CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE sminv.ExchangeRateINV2 END,'#,##.00') AS EXT, CASE WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=2 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN ( (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END)) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount< 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) ELSE (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) END AS AmountINV ,CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END AS Amountvnd, curr.Code, curdt.Code FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner cus ON cus.Id=sminv.VendorId LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt ON dt.ShipmentInvoiceId = sminv.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = sminv.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = sminv.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curdt ON curdt.Id=dt.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' SELECT CASE WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=2 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount>= 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN ( (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END)) WHEN sminv.DebitAmount< 0 AND dt.TypeId=1 THEN (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) * (-1) ELSE (CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END) END AS AmountINV ,CASE WHEN sminv.CurrencyId IS NULL THEN dt.Quantity * dt.Amount WHEN curr.Code = 'VND' THEN ROUND(dt.Quantity * ROUND(dt.Amount*dt.ExchangeRateINV,0),0) ELSE dt.Quantity * dt.Amount END AS Amountvnd, fee.Name AS namefee, unit.Name AS unit, dt.Quantity AS Qty, dt.Amount AS amountOG, curdt.Code AS curdt, dt.Vat AS VAT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS Sott FROM dbo.ShipmentInvoice sminv LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner cus ON cus.Id=sminv.VendorId LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoiceDetail dt ON dt.ShipmentInvoiceId = sminv.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = sminv.ShipmentId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON curr.Id = sminv.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.FeeType fee ON fee.Id=dt.DescriptionId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curdt ON curdt.Id=dt.CurrencyId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=dt.UnitId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId WHERE sminv.Id='{Id}' ORDER BY dt.[Order] ASC

GridPolicies.Query:
{
    "sql": "SELECT ds.*,
     case when (ds.TypeId = 2 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 0)) then 1 else 0 end as IsPayable,
     ds.ExchangeRateINV AS ExchangeRateINV 
     FROM ShipmentFee AS ds 
     left join MasterData cr on ds.CurrencyId = cr.Id 
     WHERE (((ds.ShipmentId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ',')) and '{HblIds}' != '') or ('{HblIds}' = '')) 
     AND ((ds.FileId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{MblIds}', ',')) and '{MblIds}' != '') or ('{MblIds}' = '')) 
     AND ((ds.ShipmentInvoiceId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{InvoiceIds}', ',')) 
     AND '{InvoiceIds}' != '') or ('{InvoiceIds}' = '')) 
     AND ('{VendorIds}' != '' and ds.VendorId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ','))) 
     AND ('{DescriptionIds}' = '' or ds.DescriptionId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{DescriptionIds}', ','))) 
     AND ('1' = '{TaxInvoiceId}' OR ( '2' = '{TaxInvoiceId}' and ( ds.InvoiceDetailId is not null) OR ( '3' = '{TaxInvoiceId}' AND ds.InvoiceDetailId is null))) 
     AND ('1' = '{DebitTypeId}' OR ( '2' = '{DebitTypeId}' and ( ds.ShipmentInvoiceDetailId is not null) OR ( '3' = '{DebitTypeId}' AND ds.ShipmentInvoiceDetailId is null))) 
     AND ('1' = '{ChargePaidId}' OR ( '2' = '{ChargePaidId}' and ( ds.IsInvoice = 1) OR ( '3' = '{ChargePaidId}' AND ds.IsInvoice = 0))) 
     AND ((-2 = {Vat} OR (-2 != {Vat} AND ds.Vat = {Vat})) OR (-1 = {Vat} AND ds.Vat IS NULL)) 
     AND ('{DateFieldId}' = 'InsertedDate' or ('{DateFieldId}' != 'InsertedDate' and ds.{DateFieldId} >= '{FromDate}' and ds.{DateFieldId} <= '{ToDate}')) 
     AND (('{ServiceIds}' = '' or ds.ServiceId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ServiceIds}', ',')))) 
     AND ds.IsNoDocs = 0 and ({FeeTypeId}) and (ds.TotalRemain > 0 or ds.Id IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{FeeIds}', ','))))",
    "total": "select count(ds.Id) as total 
    from ShipmentFee as ds 
    WHERE (((ds.ShipmentId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ',')) and '{HblIds}' != '') or ('{HblIds}' = '')) 
     AND ((ds.FileId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{MblIds}', ',')) and '{MblIds}' != '') or ('{MblIds}' = '')) 
     AND ((ds.ShipmentInvoiceId IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{InvoiceIds}', ',')) 
     AND '{InvoiceIds}' != '') or ('{InvoiceIds}' = '')) 
     AND ('{VendorIds}' != '' and ds.VendorId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ','))) 
     AND ('{DescriptionIds}' = '' or ds.DescriptionId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{DescriptionIds}', ','))) 
     AND ('1' = '{TaxInvoiceId}' OR ( '2' = '{TaxInvoiceId}' and ( ds.InvoiceDetailId is not null) OR ( '3' = '{TaxInvoiceId}' AND ds.InvoiceDetailId is null))) 
     AND ('1' = '{DebitTypeId}' OR ( '2' = '{DebitTypeId}' and ( ds.ShipmentInvoiceDetailId is not null) OR ( '3' = '{DebitTypeId}' AND ds.ShipmentInvoiceDetailId is null))) 
     AND ('1' = '{ChargePaidId}' OR ( '2' = '{ChargePaidId}' and ( ds.IsInvoice = 1) OR ( '3' = '{ChargePaidId}' AND ds.IsInvoice = 0))) 
     AND ((-2 = {Vat} OR (-2 != {Vat} AND ds.Vat = {Vat})) OR (-1 = {Vat} AND ds.Vat IS NULL)) 
     AND ('{DateFieldId}' = 'InsertedDate' or ('{DateFieldId}' != 'InsertedDate' and ds.{DateFieldId} >= '{FromDate}' and ds.{DateFieldId} <= '{ToDate}')) 
     AND (('{ServiceIds}' = '' or ds.ServiceId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{ServiceIds}', ',')))) 
     AND ds.IsNoDocs = 0 and ({FeeTypeId}) and (ds.TotalRemain > 0 or ds.Id IN (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{FeeIds}', ','))))"
}
GridPolicies.PreQuery:
var gridParent = this.EditForm.ChildCom.find(x => x.Meta.FieldName == "VoucherDetail");
var feeIds = new Set(gridParent.Item.map(x => x.Entity.ShipmentFeeId));
return {
    "InvoiceIds": this.EditForm.Entity.InvoiceIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.InvoiceIds : '',
    "HblIds": this.EditForm.Entity.HblIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.HblIds : '',
    "MblIds": this.EditForm.Entity.FileIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.FileIds : '',
    "VendorIds": this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds : '',
    "DescriptionIds": this.EditForm.Entity.DescriptionIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.DescriptionIds : '',
    "ShipmentInvoiceId": this.EditForm.Entity.Id,
    "ExchangeRateINV": this.EditForm.Entity.ExchangeRateINV || 1,
    "ExchangeRateINV2": this.EditForm.Entity.ExchangeRateINV2 || 1,
    "DebitTypeId": this.EditForm.Entity.DebitTypeId || 1,
    "TaxInvoiceId": this.EditForm.Entity.TaxInvoiceId || 1,
    "ChargePaidId": this.EditForm.Entity.ChargePaidId || 1,
    "FeeIds": feeIds.size === 0 ? "" : Array.from(feeIds).join(","),
    "Vat": this.EditForm.Entity.Vat || -2,
    "NoDocsId": this.EditForm.Entity.NoDocsId,
    "FromDate": this.EditForm.Entity.FromDate ? this.dayjs(this.EditForm.Entity.FromDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') : '',
    "ToDate": this.EditForm.Entity.ToDate ? this.dayjs(this.EditForm.Entity.ToDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') : '',
    "DateFieldId": this.EditForm.Entity.DateFieldId ? this.EditForm.Entity.DateFieldId : 'InsertedDate',
    "Currency": this.EditForm.Entity.Currency ? this.EditForm.Entity.Currency.Code : 'VND',
    "CurrencyId": this.EditForm.Entity.CurrencyId,
    "ServiceIds": this.EditForm.Entity.ServiceIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.ServiceIds : '',
    "FeeTypeId": this.Entity.FeeTypeId || "ds.Type in (1,2,3,4)"
}
